nodes.text: Durable plastifoam was a unique type of plastifoam, a kind of packing material, that was developed by the Galactic Republic scientist Doctor Nasan Godera.

Durable plastifoam was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011, by the non-player character Eckard Lokin during the Imperial Agent mission "Chaos on a Broken World" on the planet Taris.
